## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                             | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | --------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `index`  | `index`   | Defines the index of the according tab. | `number` | `undefined` |
| `label`  | `label`   | Defines the label used in tabs.         | `string` | `undefined` |
